User criteria

User criteria is used to define conditions that are evaluated against user records. For example, create a USA Sales user criteria record matching users who are both in the sales team and based in the USA.

User criteria is used for the following applications.
  • Service catalog: Can be applied to catalog items and categories to control access to these items and categories. Use the Available For and Not Available For related lists on catalog items and categories. Once defined, user criteria records can be reused across different catalog items and categories.
  • Knowledge: Can be applied to knowledge bases and articles. Use the Can Read and Can Contribute related lists in knowledge bases. Use the Can Read and Cannot Read lists In a knowledge article.
  • Service Portal: Works the same way as in service catalog and knowledge.

After you define user criteria for any application, the user criteria record is available to all applications.
